title: Looking for similar font
content:
Hi,

I am a wondering if anyone can recommend a font close to "The battle of Atlanta" text. Thanks.

[http://www.e6allstar.com/images/ragecover.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018022844/http:/www.e6allstar.com/images/ragecover.jpg "http://www.e6allstar.com/images/ragecover.jpg")

The Original  
 [http://content.answers.com/main/content/wp/en/5/51/RAtM-BattleofLosAngel...](http://web.archive.org/web/20131018022844/http:/content.answers.com/main/content/wp/en/5/51/RAtM-BattleofLosAngeles.jpeg "http://content.answers.com/main/content/wp/en/5/51/RAtM-BattleofLosAngeles.jpeg")
author: laniblaze

comments.content: Thank you Stephan! You helped me out. Of the ones listed I ended up having Flood and Notec, I went with Flood and it turned out great! Thanks again.
